Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Ruffian: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 21 on Athletics checks
Cloud Jump: Triples the distance of long jumps, increases high jump distance to normal long jump distance, and adds 25' to jump distances for every additional action spent
Combat Climber: Can Climb with one hand occupied, can fight while Climbing, and does not suffer flat-footed while Climbing
Powerful Leap: Can make 5' vertical and +5' horizontal jumps
Quick Climb: Can Climb at full Speed
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Quick Swim: Can Swim at full Speed
Rapid Mantel: Can stand immediately after a successful Grab an Edge and use Athletics to Grab an Edge
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 3 sizes larger
Combat
Hit Points: 41 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 5 (%1; %2)
Armor: None Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Light Hammer (+5 1d6 B R20'; strength; trained); Pick (+5 1d6 P [Crit d10]; strength; trained); Sickle (+6 1d4 S; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +9
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Ruffian: Defense Trained (Medium Armor)
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Blowgun as one category simpler
Brutal Beating: Critical successes on Strikes inflict frightened 1
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of equal or lower level
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering Reactions
Ruffian: Can use any weapon, other than simple or martial weapons that deal greater than d8 or d6 damage, to sneak attack/Critical hits with these weapons on an off-guard foe inflict their critical specialization effect
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or ranged weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard on creatures that haven't acted
Underwater Marauder: Does not suffer flat-footed or penalties using bludgeoning and slashing weapons in water
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Notes
Validation Errors:
Cloud Jump Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and athletics rank (currently 4) >= 4
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 10 allocated
Quick Climb Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and athletics rank (currently 4) >= 3
Quick Swim Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and athletics rank (currently 4) >= 3
